kjv_def: abound, abundant, make to increase, have over
strongs_def: to do, make or be more, i.e. increase (transitively or intransitively); by extension, to superabound
outline:
1. to superabound
    1. of things
      1. to exist in abundance
      2. to increase
      3. be augmented
    2. to make to increase: one in a thing
